snippet: Extending federal jobless benefits is the least the lawmakers should do before they leave town for the holidays.
abstract: Editorial, citing declining economic data, calls on Congress to extend federal unemployment benefits, which are set to expire at the end of 2012; notes over five million long-term unemployed will lose benefits if nothing is done.
lead_paragraph: Extending federal jobless benefits is the least the lawmakers should do before they leave town for the holidays.
